item.title: Airline executives set to defend seat fees before Senate panel
item.description: Executives from American, United, Delta, Frontier and Spirit are set to testify before a Senate panel Wednesday about their seating fees.

item.title: Trump's pick to lead the DEA withdraws from consideration
item.description: Florida sheriff Chad Chronister took his name out of the running three days after Trump announced he would nominate him to be the next DEA administrat...

item.title: Florida woman who led a nearly $200 million Ponzi scheme sentenced to 20 years in prison
item.description: Federal prosecutors said Florida resident Johanna Garcia led a Ponzi scheme that raised nearly $200 million and lost investors nearly $90 million.

item.title: Salesforce shares rise after earnings beat on revenue, fourth-quarter guidance
item.description: Salesforce reported its fiscal third-quarter earnings on Tuesday and posted strong fourth-quarter guidance.

item.title: Trump's pick for defense secretary, Pete Hegseth, is in peril in the Senate
